{"id":710463839,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 months, 1 week","timestamp":1653914536,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/710463839/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Divide Two Integers","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int divide(int dividend, int divisor) {\n        if(dividend==INT_MIN && divisor==-1) return INT_MAX;\n        if(dividend==INT_MIN && divisor==1) return INT_MIN;\n        long int dd = abs(dividend), dv = abs(divisor);\n        int res=0;\n        while(dv<=dd) {\n            long int mul=dv, tmp=1;\n            while(mul<=dd-mul) {\n                mul+=mul;\n                tmp+=tmp;\n            }\n            res+=tmp;\n            dd-=mul;\n        }\n        \n        if((dividend<0&&divisor>0) || (dividend>0&&divisor<0)) return -res;\n        return res;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"divide-two-integers"}
